verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to the Gittith. A Psalm of the sons of Korah. How amiable <WH3039> are thy tabernacles <WH4908>, O Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>!

My soul <WH5315> longeth <WH3700>, yea <WH3615>, even fainteth for the courts <WH2691> of Jehovah <WH3068>; My heart <WH3820> and my flesh <WH1320> cry out <WH7442> unto the living <WH2416> God <WH410>.

Yea <WH6833>, the sparrow hath found <WH4672> her a house <WH1004>, And the swallow <WH1866> a nest <WH7064> for herself <WH7896>, where she may lay her young <WH667>, Even thine altars <WH4196>, O Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, My King <WH4428>, and my God <WH430>.
Blessed <WH835> are they that dwell <WH3427> in thy house <WH1004>: They will be still praising <WH1984> thee <WH5542>. Selah
Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH120> whose strength <WH5797> is in thee <WH3824>; In whose heart are the highways to Zion <WH4546>.
Passing <WH5674> through the valley <WH6010> of Weeping <WH1056> they make <WH7896> it a place of springs <WH4599>; Yea <WH4175>, the early rain covereth <WH5844> it with blessings <WH1293>.
They go <WH3212> from strength <WH2428> to strength <WH2428>; Every one of them appeareth <WH7200> before God <WH430> in Zion <WH6726>.
O Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> of hosts <WH6635>, hear <WH8085> my prayer <WH8605>; Give ear <WH238>, O God <WH430> of Jacob <WH3290>. <WH5542>[[Selah
Behold <WH7200>, O God <WH430> our shield <WH4043>, And look <WH5027> upon the face <WH6440> of thine anointed <WH4899>.

For a day <WH3117> in thy courts <WH2691> is better <WH2896> than a thousand <WH505>. I had rather <WH977> be a doorkeeper <WH5605> in the house <WH1004> of my God <WH430>, Than to dwell <WH1752> in the tents <WH168> of wickedness <WH7562>.

For Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> is a sun <WH8121> and a shield <WH4043>: Jehovah <WH3068> will give <WH5414> grace <WH2580> and glory <WH3519>; No good <WH2896> thing will he withhold <WH4513> from them that walk <WH1980> uprightly <WH8549>.
O Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH120> that trusteth in thee <WH982>.
